class.name: JarWorld
class.brief_description: Abstract base class for world types such as [JarPlanarWorld] and [JarSphericalWorld].
class.description: This is an abstract class that serves as the base for specific world types such as [JarPlanarWorld] and [JarSphericalWorld]. It provides shared properties like gravity and mass references, but is not meant to be used directly in scenes.

members.member: Base gravitational acceleration for this world. This value does not directly affect physics or object behavior. It is intended as a reference for use by custom gameplay or simulation systems.
Deprecated. Previously intended for mass-related calculations but is unused.
